result.execSummary:
All charges against Deangelo Darnell Crawford in this case have been dismissed. These charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Deangelo Darnell Crawford is presumed innocent.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Deangelo Darnell Crawford

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Deangelo Darnell Crawford in court with attorney Joel H. Rosenthal.  Julie D Knyszek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: SD.  
Case set for jury trial.  State's essential witness failed to appear.  State has no alternative theory of prosecution.  Defense motion to DISMISS is granted by the Court WITHOUT PREJUDICE.

Attorney Joel H. Rosenthal in court.  Joshua Milder appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Case in court for final pretrial conference. Court is in trial on another case and is unable to proceed on this matter. Case remains calendared for jury trial on 8/17/2022 at 9:00 am.  Parties are advised that effective August 1, 2022 this case will be assigned to Judge Audrey Skwierawski, Branch 41 in Room 501 of the Courthouse.

Defendant Deangelo Darnell Crawford in court with attorney Joel H. Rosenthal.  Elaine B. Fehrs appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Case in court for status conference. Case is in trial posture, defense counsel requests case be placed on the trial calendar. Any pretrial motions to be filed a week before the final pretrial date. Case adjourned to Branch 35.  Parties are advised that effective August 1, 2022 this case will be assigned to Judge Audrey Skwierawski, Branch 41 in Room 501 of the Courthouse.  Final pre-trial scheduled for July 20, 2022 at 08:30 am.  Jury trial scheduled for August 17, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Attorney Joel H. Rosenthal in court.  Gerald Henry Alder appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Case in court for pretrial conference. Defense counsel is in trial on another case and is unable to proceed on this matter. Case adjourned to Branch 35.  Status conference scheduled for May 27, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Court ordered no contact with KBC (07/31/1994)
No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.

Court ordered Justice Point Pretrial Services LEVEL 2 SUPERVISION.  Court reminders.  
No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.  
Defendant advised if released from custody it is a requirement to attend all future court proceedings.
Failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping, a warrant issued or high cash bail.

Defendant Deangelo Darnell Crawford in court with attorney Colleen Cullen.  Defendant Deangelo Darnell Crawford in custody.  James C Griffin appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deangelo Darnell Crawford appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Rosa, Branch 35.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant pled not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  This hearing will be streamed live on https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/d9e3cc7f-7791-ec2d-80d3-5bfcdc106eb3  Pre-trial conference scheduled for April 13, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
